name: EI-AIAAT 2018 : 2018 2nd International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications and Technologies
content: ‚óèPublication and Indexing 1\. All accepted and registered papers will be included in IOP Conference Series: Materials Science and Engineering,which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other databases. \*All registered and presented papers will be online publishing. 2\. Selected papers with extension can be recommended to publish in International journals.
